05_dif-and-mg-cfa-hpt-bias.Rmd

Purpose: Assess whether ideological attitude groups respond differently to HPT items even with equal underlying HPT competence.
Content:

Create low/high ideology groups.

DIF analysis for each HPT item.

Multi-group CFA (configural → metric → scalar) to test measurement invariance.

Interpretation: Does measurement bias support or weaken H1?

This file directly implements the “ideological contamination” tests proposed in the PCI RR.
